Maverick AV Solutions with: Logitech

Logitech’s video collaboration solutions create seamless connections between users, whether working from home, in the office or on the move.

Their innovative tools are optimised for user performance and IT success with advanced video collaboration solutions will give you powerful, easy-to-deploy victories across all types of meeting.

Personal Collaboration

Whether working from your home or in the office, Logitech has essential tools for presenting yourself perfectly.

Working C925E

C925e is an HD 1080p webcam that delivers outstanding video and sound. Certified for business, affordably priced and engineered for all-day use.

  • 1080p Auto-focus camera
  • Logitech Rightlight Technology™ 2 Inside
  • Stereo Omnidirectional microphones
View Working C925E details

Build collaboration with Brio

4K and HDR packed into the palm of your hand. The Brio is Logitech’s most advanced personal business webcam.

  • Multiple resolutions:
    • 4K@30 fps
    • 1080p 30fps/60fp
    • 720p @ 30fps/60fp/90fps
  • Autofocus
  • Rightlight Technology™ 3 Inside
View Brio details

Video collaboration for every meeting room

Logitech Tap

Meeting room touch controller for video conferencing services, including Google Meet™, Microsoft Teams® Rooms, and Zoom Rooms™. With a sleek design, silent operation, and motion sensor for always-on readiness, Tap brings ease and convenience to online meetings.

  • Responsive 10.1” touch screen for easy operation.
  • Commercial-grade cable management with strain relief to keep connections tight.
  • Versatile table and wall mount accessories hide cabling and conserve space.
  • Bundled with a meeting room computer approved and/or certified for Google Meet Rooms, Microsoft Teams Rooms, or Zoom Rooms.
View Logitech Tap details

Logitech MeetUp

Designed for huddle rooms and other smaller spaces, MeetUp packs big features into a compact form factor.

  • 4K Ultra HDCamera with 5XHD zoom
  • Full-range speaker system
  • Beamforming microphone array
  • Motorized pan/tilt lens
View Logitech MeetUp details

The Rally Bar (and Rally Bar Mini)

Meeting rooms revitalised. Create Zoom Rooms, Microsoft Teams Rooms, Google Rooms and more with The Rally Bar range. All-in-one conferencing solutions that can be connected straight into a laptop, without the need for an external compute.

  • 4K PTZ Camera
  • Beamforming Microphones
  • 5x optical zoom
  • Rightsense technology
View Rally Bar details
